item.title: Git_basics
item.description: Basics of Version Control using Git Git is a platform for version control. If there are a large number of people working on a single project then keeping track of who made what changes when and where becomes very important. In my experience the best way to learn git it by demostration. Getting a copy of repository on local device We don’t want to make changes in the original repository which is there in the cloud (or at remote-location), hence we make a clone (or copy) of the repository and save it locally.
